General_Description: '''Out for Blood''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]] is pushing hard on [[Athens|Athenian]] lands. We need to send them a message: clear their troops of elite members and we'll see if they can keep their momentum."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Spartan [[brute]]s, [[Strategos|strategoi]], and [[Nation Leader|leaders]] all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
